crisp3.parametersJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "identifier",
		"type": "text",
		"label": "Identifier",
		"required": true,
		"editable": true,
		"help": "Generate your tokens [here](https://marketplace.crisp.chat/)."
	},
	{
		"name": "key",
		"type": "password",
		"label": "Key",
		"required": true,
		"editable": true,
		"help": "Generate your tokens [here](https://marketplace.crisp.chat/)."
	},
	{
		"name": "websiteID",
		"type": "text",
		"label": "Website ID",
		"editable": true,
		"required": true
	}
]
